coded_answer.p: I am writing to thank you for to sendsending me all the details about my prize and I'd like to give you a completeall the information about the journey will be done by myself.

I would like to travel at the beginning of the month, which could be between the first and the fifteethfifteenth of julyJuly, because afterwards I have several business meetings and it would be difficult for me to take a trip.

Related withRegarding accommodation, I'd prefer to stay in a log cabinslog cabin. Although I like camping and sharing with different kindkinds of people, I'd prefer a confortablecomfortable and private place (if it's possible) where I can sleep, or be quiet.. I am not a teenager!

Really, this prize is wonderful to have a healthy life. I want to do two activities;: painting and tennis. The first one is for my mental health,. I need a break infrom my style of lifelifestyle. theThe second one is just because I'm a fanaticfan of that sportssport (really I'm not martine hingis).
Eventually, I'd like to request to have some special food, because andI'm a vegetarian person, besides I try to eat just organic food.
I hope my reply has been suitablehelpful.

How are you doing? It havehas been a long time since the last time I wrote to you... I'm sorry. However, the reason is absolutely amazing. I was training to be a personal assistanceassistant to Madonna herself. Maybe, you don't believe me, but it's true.

I applied tofor the job and she selected me betweenfrom hundreds of candidates (I don't receive any salary). My workjob is to help her during each concert. You know, she has a brilliant performanceact where she must change her customscostumes, make upmake-up, the scenery, everytimeevery time; so she needs a lot of people near.

My first job was inat the Hillsborough'sHillsborough concert ( I think, you heard about it). I was running all the showthe whole show, my. My responsabilityresponsibility was to get dress her. I wasn't alone,. I worked with a staff of ten people. We had to take of some clothes off her and then to put on othersother ones completlycompletely differentcompletely different ones, in just a few minutes (similar to Formula One).
I was exhausted when the concert finished, anyway. Anyway it has been one of my best experienceexperiences and I'll remember it for lifeever.
Finally, I send you all my positive energy and I am looking forward to receiving your letter backreply.
